c74object.name: cage.envelopes
c74object.digest: Modify a bach.roll or bach.score via synchronized envelopes
c74object.description: Synchronizes a set of envelopes (contained in a bach.slot object) to modify bach.roll or bach.score chords.

inlet.digest: Gathered syntax of original bach.roll or bach.score
bang when bach.roll or bach.score is changed via the interface
Messages from bach.slot's "Queries and Notifications" outlet
bang when bach.slot is changed via the interface

outlet.digest: Feedback messages for bach.roll or bach.score
Lambda outlet: current chord in gathered syntax
Lambda outlet: current function values in gathered syntax
outlet.description: For each lambda-output chord, all the function are sampled at its onset, and the result are listed and output.

outlet.digest: Lambda outlet: additional chord information (voice, or voice and measure)
outlet.description: If the original object was a bach.roll, for each lambda-output chord, its voice number is output; if the original object was a bach.score, for each lambda-output chord its voice number and measure number are output.

method.name: bang
method.description:
A bang in the third inlet must notify interface changes in bach.roll or bach.score. Third inlet should thus be connected with the rightmost outlet of the notation objects.
A bang in the fifth inlet must notify interface changes in bach.slot. Fifth inlet should thus be connected with the rightmost outlet of bach.slot.

method.name: llll
method.description:
Any llll in expected to be the dumped content of a bach.roll or bach.score, in gathered syntax.
An llll in the fourth inlet is expected to contain the synchronization information coming from the playout of bach.roll or bach.score.
An llll in the second inlet is expected to contain synchronization information coming from bach.slot's "Queries and Notifications" outlet.
An llll in the sixth (lambda) inlet contains the "result" of the lambda loop: the modified chord, to be taken into account.
